players.name: Alice
memory: You're Alice, the villager.
Night 1 begins.
The villager Bob was found dead.
Day 1 begins.
Charlie: "I was with Alice the whole night, we were in the kitchen together. Bob was acting weird and you should investigate him. Alice, you're the real suspect."
Diana: "I investigated Charlie last night and found him mafia. Bob died, likely by him. Vote Charlie."
You: "I think Charlie is mafia, he tried to blame Alice and Bob was killed. Vote Charlie."
You: "I agree with Diana – Charlie was the one who killed Bob and is lying about Alice. Vote Charlie."
Charlie: "I was with Alice all night, we were in the kitchen together. Alice, I have no reason to kill Bob; if you suspect me, vote for Diana, she knows me."
Diana: "Charlie knows I'm detective; he's lying. Bob died at night 1, likely killed by mafia. I investigated him and found him mafia. Vote Charlie."

players.name: Bob
memory: You're Bob, the villager.
Day 1 begins.

players.name: Charlie
memory: You're Charlie, the mafioso.
Night 1 begins.
You killed Bob.
The villager Bob was found dead.
Beware, Diana is the detective and discovered you're the mafioso.
Day 1 begins.
You: "I was with Alice the whole night, we were in the kitchen together. Bob was acting weird and you should investigate him. Alice, you're the real suspect."
Diana: "I investigated Charlie last night and found him mafia. Bob died, likely by him. Vote Charlie."
Alice: "I think Charlie is mafia, he tried to blame Alice and Bob was killed. Vote Charlie."
Alice: "I agree with Diana – Charlie was the one who killed Bob and is lying about Alice. Vote Charlie."
You: "I was with Alice all night, we were in the kitchen together. Alice, I have no reason to kill Bob; if you suspect me, vote for Diana, she knows me."
Diana: "Charlie knows I'm detective; he's lying. Bob died at night 1, likely killed by mafia. I investigated him and found him mafia. Vote Charlie."
Votes: Alice voted for Diana, Charlie voted for Alice, Diana voted for Charlie
Alice was arrested
